law.catch_line: A drug that is dispensed under a prescription shall bear a label that states:...

text.section:
If a drug dispensed under a prescription meets the label requirements of this section, it is exempt from the provisions of:
Section 21-217(b)(3) through (7) of this subtitle; and
Section 21-218(b)(1) through (4), (7), (8), (13), and (14) of this subtitle.
The exemptions under this section do not apply to any drug that is dispensed in the course of the conduct of a business of dispensing drugs on the basis of diagnosis made through the mail.
